channel.title: Practice Question on Code World
channel.description: Recent content in Practice Question on Code World

item.title: Mark & Toys
item.description: This question is taken from HackerRank Website. Here is the link Problem Statement Mark and Jane are very happy after having their first child. Their son loves toys, so Mark wants to buy some.

item.title: Delete Without Head Pointer
item.description: Question You are given a pointer/ reference to the node which is to be deleted from the linked list of N nodes. The task is to delete the node.

item.title: Reverse Words in a Given String
item.description: Question Given a String S, reverse the string without reversing its individual words. Words are separated by dots. Example Input: S = i.like.this.program.very.much Output: much.very.program.this.like.i

item.title: Minimize the Difference
item.description: Problem Statement You are given an array ‘A’ of length ‘N’ consisting only of positive integers and an integer ‘K’. You have to update every element of the array by increasing or decreasing its value by ‘K’ only once.
